title: Rashi Tzaddik haya bedorosav
textContent: Tzaddik haya bedorosav. Quesiton: Why do we need to say, bedorosav, everyone is in his generation. Rashi says, there are 2 interpretations: one for praise, one for the opposite. The praise: even in this terrible genration he managed to remain a tzaddik. The opposite: he was a tzaddik only comparing to his terrible generation, but had he lived in Avraham Avinus generation, he would have been a simple person.

title: Noach less then Avrohom Avinu
textContent: Noach was a tzaddik, but he did not affect his generation, while Avrohom Avinu did. Because Noach did not trust himself, that the people would listen to him.

title: Noach and the lion
textContent: When Noach was late feeding the lion by 15 minutes, the lion bit him in the leg. Why being 15 minutes late leads to such harsh punishment? Becaue the whole world was in the arch. If Noach was not feeding one of the animals, we would not have that animal now. God's plan to keep the World with the animals he wanted to keep would not succeed. This teaches us that our task is always so important, we are not allowed to take it light, because it is part of God's plan.
